                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.learn.a1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class A1gop {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    private a1 data;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public A1gop(){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public A1gop(a1 a){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.data=a;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void yesno(){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        if(data.getAge()<18){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println("æœªæˆå¹´");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        else if(data.getAge()>=18){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println("æˆå¹´");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //ä½¿ç”¨
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.learn.a1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class a2 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a1 s3 = new a1("å¼ ä¸‰",2);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A1gop s = new A1gop(s3);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        s.yesno();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ç»¼åˆæ¡ˆä¾‹â€”â€”æ¨¡ä»¿ç”µå½±ä¿¡æ¯ç³»ç»Ÿ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • å±•ç¤ºç³»ç»Ÿç”µå½±ï¼ˆç”µå½±åç§°ï¼Œä»·æ ¼ï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®idæŸ¥è¯¢è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æ•°æ®å­˜å–ç±»
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.learn.a1.move;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class data {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   private int id;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   private String name;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   private String dates;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   private double srart;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   private String people;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public data() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public data(int id, String name, String dates, double srart, String people) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.id = id;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.name = name;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.dates = dates;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.srart = srart;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.people = people;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public int getId() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return id;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void setId(int id) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.id = id;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public String getName() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return name;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void setName(String name) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.name = name;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public String getDates() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return dates;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void setDates(String dates) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.dates = dates;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public double getSrart() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return srart;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void setSrart(int srart) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.srart = srart;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public String getPeople() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return people;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void setPeople(String people) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.people = people;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                // æ•°æ®å¤„ç†ç±»
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.learn.a1.move;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class chulidata {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    private data[] data;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public chulidata() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public chulidata(com.learn.a1.move.data[] data) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.data = data;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void printmoves(){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println("------ç³»ç»Ÿå…¨éƒ¨ç”µå½±------");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(String.format("IDï¼š%d\tåç§°ï¼š%s\tä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š%s\tè¯„åˆ†ï¼š%.2f\tä½œè€…ï¼š%s",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    data[i].getId(),data[i].getName(),data[i].getDates(),data[i].getSrart(),data[i].getPeople()));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void findmv(int id){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println("------ä½ è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„ç”µå½±------");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if (data[i].getId()==id){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                System.out.println(String.format("IDï¼š%d\tåç§°ï¼š%s\tä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š%s\tè¯„åˆ†ï¼š%.2f\tä½œè€…ï¼š%s",
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        data[i].getId(),data[i].getName(),data[i].getDates(),data[i].getSrart(),data[i].getPeople()));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            return;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println("æœªæŸ¥åˆ°ç›¸å…³ç”µå½±");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡å¹¶ä½¿ç”¨
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.learn.a1.move;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class mainfun {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        data d1 = new data(1,"çŒ«å’Œè€é¼ ","2021-7-1",4.8,"å¼ ä¸‰");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        data d2 = new data(2,"è¥¿æ¸¸è®°","2022-5-3",3.5,"é‡Œæ–¯");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        data d3 = new data(3,"ä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰","2023-7-5",4.5,"èµµå…­");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        data d4 = new data(4,"æ°´æµ’ä¼ ","2024-3-1",4.6,"ç‹äº”");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        chulidata a = new chulidata(new data[]{d1, d2, d3, d4});
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a.printmoves();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a.findmv(2);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a.findmv(11);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                /*
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ------ç³»ç»Ÿå…¨éƒ¨ç”µå½±------
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IDï¼š1    åç§°ï¼šçŒ«å’Œè€é¼  ä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š2021-7-1   è¯„åˆ†ï¼š4.80 ä½œè€…ï¼šå¼ ä¸‰
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IDï¼š2    åç§°ï¼šè¥¿æ¸¸è®°  ä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š2022-5-3   è¯„åˆ†ï¼š3.50 ä½œè€…ï¼šé‡Œæ–¯
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IDï¼š3    åç§°ï¼šä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰ ä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š2023-7-5   è¯„åˆ†ï¼š4.50 ä½œè€…ï¼šèµµå…­
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IDï¼š4    åç§°ï¼šæ°´æµ’ä¼   ä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š2024-3-1   è¯„åˆ†ï¼š4.60 ä½œè€…ï¼šç‹äº”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ------ä½ è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„ç”µå½±------
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IDï¼š2    åç§°ï¼šè¥¿æ¸¸è®°  ä¸Šæ˜ æ—¶é—´ï¼š2022-5-3   è¯„åˆ†ï¼š3.50 ä½œè€…ï¼šé‡Œæ–¯
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ------ä½ è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„ç”µå½±------
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æœªæŸ¥åˆ°ç›¸å…³ç”µå½±
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                */

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. ç±»åé¦–å­—æ¯å¤§å†™ï¼Œæœ‰æ„ä¹‰ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é©¼å³°å‘½åæ³•ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨å…³é”®å­—ï¼Œåˆæ³•çš„æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. ä¸€ä¸ªJavaæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰å¤šä¸ªç±»ï¼Œä½†åªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯publicä¿®é¥°çš„ï¼Œä¸”publicä¿®é¥°çš„ç±»å¿…é¡»å’ŒJavaæ–‡ä»¶åç›¸åŒ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é¢å‘å¯¹è±¡é«˜çº§è¯­æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                JavaAPI

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                APIï¼šåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºç¼–ç¨‹æ¥å£

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                JavaAPIæ–‡æ¡£ï¼šJava SE æ–‡æ¡£ â€” API å’Œæ–‡æ¡£ | Oracle ä¸­å›½

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                åœ¨è‡ªå·±ç¨‹åºä¸­è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–åŒ…çš„æ³¨æ„äº‹é¡¹

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • åœ¨å½“å‰ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œè¦è°ƒç”¨è‡ªå·±åŒ…ä¸‹çš„å…¶ä»–ç¨‹åºï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨ï¼ˆåŒä¸€åŒ…ä¸‹çš„ç±»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›¸äº’è°ƒç”¨ï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • åœ¨å½“å‰ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œè¦è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–åŒ…ä¸‹çš„ç¨‹åºï¼Œå¿…é¡»åœ¨å½“å‰ç¨‹åºä¸­å¯¼åŒ…ï¼Œæ‰å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®ã€‚ï¼ˆå¯¼åŒ…ï¼šimport åŒ…å.ç±»åï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • åœ¨å½“å‰ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œè¦è°ƒç”¨Javaæä¾›çš„ç¨‹åºï¼Œä¹Ÿå¿…é¡»å…ˆå¯¼åŒ…ï¼Œæ‰å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚ä½†Java.langåŒ…ä¸‹çš„ç¨‹åºæ˜¯ä¸éœ€è¦å¯¼åŒ…çš„ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • åœ¨å½“å‰ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œè¦è°ƒç”¨å¤šä¸ªä¸åŒåŒ…ä¸‹çš„ç¨‹åºï¼Œè€Œè¿™äº›ç¨‹åºåæ­£å¥½ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œé»˜è®¤åªèƒ½å¯¼å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªç¨‹åºï¼Œå¦ä¸€ä¸ªç¨‹åºå¿…é¡»å¸¦åŒ…åè®¿é—®ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                åˆ›å»ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æ–¹å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. Javaç¨‹åºä¸­æ‰€æœ‰çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ–‡å­—éƒ½æ˜¯æ­¤ç±»å¯¹è±¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string name = "å¼ ä¸‰";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  string tex = "abcdefg";

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. è°ƒç”¨æ„é€ å™¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¯¹è±¡ ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ„é€ å™¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class Main {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String a = "aaa";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String b= new String();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(b);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          char[] c = {'ä½ ','h'};
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String d = new String(c);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(d);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          byte[] e = {98,99,100};
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String f = new String(e);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(f);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  /*
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  è¾“å‡º
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  aaa
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ä½ h
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  bcd
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  */

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Stringå¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class Main {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String a = "ä½ å¥½ä¸–ç•Œ,hello";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //è·å–å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„é•¿åº¦
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a.length());//10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //è·å–æŸä¸ªç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®å¤„çš„å­—ç¬¦è¿”å›
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println("-----------");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a.charAt(2));//ä¸–
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //å°†å½“å‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ¢æˆå­—ç¬¦æ•°ç»„è¿”å›
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println("-----------");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        char[] b =a.toCharArray();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for (int i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(b[i]);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }/*
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ä½ 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        å¥½
