                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(Integer.parseInt(a) + 1);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(Integer.valueOf(a) + 1);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringBuilder

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringBuilderä»£è¡¨å¯å˜å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç›¸å½“äºä¸€ä¸ªå®¹å™¨ï¼Œå®ƒé‡Œé¢è£…çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ˜¯å¯ä»¥æ”¹å˜çš„ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ç”¨æ¥æ“ä½œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringBuilderç›¸è¾ƒäºStringçš„å¥½å¤„ï¼šæ›´é€‚åˆåšå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¿®æ”¹æ“ä½œï¼Œæ•ˆç‡æ›´é«˜ï¼Œä»£ç æ›´åŠ ç®€æ´ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        StringBuilder a = new StringBuilder("hello");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a.append(" world");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a);// hello world
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a.reverse();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a);// dlrow olleh
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a.length());// 11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String b = a.toString();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(b);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringBuilderæ˜¯æ”¯æŒé“¾å¼ç¼–ç¨‹çš„

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringBuffer

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringBufferå’ŒStringBuilderçš„ç”¨æ³•ä¸€æ¨¡ä¸€æ · ä½†StringBufferæ˜¯çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨çš„ï¼ŒStringBuilderæ˜¯çº¿ç¨‹ä¸å®‰å…¨çš„ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringJoiner

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å’ŒStringBuilderä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç”¨æ¥æ“ä½œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œä¸€ä¸ªå®¹å™¨ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºä¹‹åé‡Œé¢çš„å†…å®¹æ˜¯å¯å˜çš„ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                StringJoinerä¸ä»…æé«˜å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æ“ä½œæ•ˆç‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åœ¨æœ‰äº›åœºæ™¯ä¸‹ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒæ“ä½œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä»£ç ä¼šæ›´åŠ ç®€æ´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Math

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mathä»£è¡¨æ•°å­¦ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå·¥å…·ç±»ï¼Œé‡Œé¢æä¾›çš„éƒ½æ˜¯å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œçš„ä¸€äº›é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mathç±»å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //abs(int a)int è·å–å‚æ•°ç»å¯¹å€¼
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.abs(-1));//1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //ceil( double a)doubleå‘ä¸Šå–æ•´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.ceil(3.14));//4.0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //floor(double a)doubleå‘ä¸‹å–æ•´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.floor(3.14));//3.0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //round(float a)intå››èˆäº”å…¥
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.round(3.14));//3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.round(3.66));//4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //max(int a,int b)intè·å–ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.max(1, 2));//2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //pow(double a,double b)doubleè¿”å›açš„bæ¬¡å¹‚
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.pow(3, 3));//27.0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //random()doubleè¿”å›å€¼ä¸ºdoubleçš„éšæœºå€¼ï¼ŒèŒƒå›´ï¼ˆ0.0-1.0ï¼‰
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(Math.random());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                System

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Systemä»£è¡¨ç¨‹åºæ‰€åœ¨çš„ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå·¥å…·ç±»

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Systemç±»å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä»£è¡¨ç¨‹åºæ‰€åœ¨çš„è¿è¡Œç¯å¢ƒã€‚ å®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå•ä¾‹ç±»ã€‚åªèƒ½æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Runtimeå¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ï¼ˆâ­ï¼‰BigDecimal

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ç”¨äºè§£å†³æµ®ç‚¹å‹è¿ç®—æ—¶ï¼Œå‡ºç°ç»“æœå¤±çœŸçš„é—®é¢˜

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                BigDecimalå¸¸ç”¨æ„é€ å™¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.awt.geom.QuadCurve2D;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.math.BigDecimal;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.math.RoundingMode;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.Random;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //BigDecimal(string a1)å°†stringè½¬æ¢æˆBigDecimal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        double a = 4.4;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        double b = 2.2;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        BigDecimal a1 = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(a));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        BigDecimal b1 = new BigDecimal(Double.toString(b));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // valueOf(double a1)BigDecimalå°†doubleè½¬æ¢æˆBigDecimal
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        BigDecimal a2 = BigDecimal.valueOf(a);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        BigDecimal b2 = BigDecimal.valueOf(b);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // add(BigDecimal b)BigDecimalåŠ æ³•
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a2.add(b2));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //subtract(BigDecimal b)BigDecimalå‡æ³•
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a2.subtract(b2));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // multiply(BigDecimal b)BigDecimalä¹˜æ³•
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a2.multiply(b2));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //divide(BigDecimal b)BigDecimalé™¤æ³•
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a2.divide(b2));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // divide(å¦ä¸€ä¸ªBigDecimalå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç²¾ç¡®å³ä¸ºï¼Œèˆå…¥æ¨¡å¼)BigDecimalé™¤æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ§åˆ¶ç²¾ç¡®åˆ°å°æ•°å‡ ä½
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a2.divide(b2, 2, RoundingMode.HALF_UP));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        // doubleValue()BigDecimalå°†BigDecimalè½¬æ¢æˆdoule
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(a2.doubleValue());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ—¶é—´ç±»

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä¼ ç»Ÿæ—¶é—´ï¼ˆJDK8ä»¥å‰ï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                è¿™äº›APIå¾ˆå¤šéƒ½å·²ç»è¿‡æ—¶äº†ï¼Œä¸æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ï¼æ¨èä½¿ç”¨JDK8ä»¥åæ–°å¢çš„æ—¶é—´API

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Dateï¼ˆå·²è¿‡æ—¶ï¼‰ ä»£è¡¨æ—¶é—´å’Œæ—¥æœŸ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • SimpleDateFormat ç®€å•æ—¥æœŸæ ¼å¼åŒ–ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŠŠæ—¥æœŸå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ—¶é—´æ¯«ç§’å€¼æ ¼å¼åŒ–æˆæˆ‘ä»¬æƒ³è¦çš„æ ¼å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  å¸¸è§æ„é€ å™¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.util.Date;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Date d = new Date();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(d);//Sun Jul 28 22:05:45 CST 2024
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          SimpleDateFormat a = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss EEE");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.format(d));//2024-07-28 22:05:45 å‘¨æ—¥
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼å¸¸è§ç¬¦å·

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  SimpleDateFormatå¯ä»¥å°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„æ—¶é—´è§£ææˆæ—¥æœŸå¯¹è±¡ æ³¨æ„ï¼šè§£æçš„æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼å¿…é¡»å’Œå®šä¹‰çš„æ—¶é—´æ ¼å¼ç›¸åŒï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç¨‹åºä¼šå‡ºç°BUG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.text.ParseException;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.util.Date;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public static void main(String[] args) throws ParseException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String t = "2024-07-28 22:05:45 å‘¨æ—¥";
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          SimpleDateFormat a = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss EEE");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Date b = a.parse(t);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(b);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          //Sun Jul 28 22:05:45 CST 2024
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Calendar Calendaræ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¥å†å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œä»£è¡¨çš„æ˜¯ç³»ç»Ÿæ­¤åˆ»æ—¶é—´å¯¹åº”çš„æ—¥å†ï¼Œå®ƒå¯ä»¥å•ç‹¬è·å–ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´çš„å¹´ã€æœˆã€æ—¥ã€æ—¶ã€åˆ†ã€ç§’ç­‰ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Calendaræ—¥å†ç±»å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.text.ParseException;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.time.Instant;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.util.Calendar;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.util.Date;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public static void main(String[] args) throws ParseException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Calendar a = Calendar.getInstance();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a);//æ‰“å°å‡ºçš„å…¨éƒ¨ä¿¡æ¯
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.get(Calendar.YEAR));//å–å¹´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH));//å–æ—¥
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          //å…¶ä»–åŒç†
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.getTime());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.getTimeInMillis());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          a.set(Calendar.MONTH, 7);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.get(Calendar.MONTH));//å–æ—¥
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          a.add(Calendar.MONTH, 2);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(a.get(Calendar.MONTH));//å–æ—¥
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ–°æ—¶é—´APIï¼ˆJDK8åŠä»¥åï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ¨èä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„æ—¶é—´APIåˆ›å»ºäº‹ä»¶å¯¹è±¡ï¼

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                è¿™äº›æ–¹å¼åˆ›å»ºå‡ºæ¥çš„å¯¹è±¡éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸å¯å˜å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ•°æ®ä¿®æ”¹åä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ç»„æ–°çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œä¸ä¼šä¿®æ”¹åŸæ¥çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚ è¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥ä¿ç•™åŸæ¥çš„æ—¥æœŸå¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LocalDateã€LocalTimeã€LocalDateTime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LocalDateï¼šæœ¬åœ°æ—¥æœŸï¼ˆå¹´ã€æœˆã€æ—¥ã€æ˜ŸæœŸï¼‰ LocalTimeï¼šæœ¬åœ°æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆæ—¶ï¼Œåˆ†ï¼Œç§’ï¼Œçº³ç§’ï¼‰ LocalDateTimeï¼šä»£è¡¨æœ¬åœ°æ—¥æœŸã€æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆå¹´ã€æœˆã€æ—¥ã€æ˜ŸæœŸã€æ—¶ï¼Œåˆ†ï¼Œç§’ï¼Œçº³ç§’ï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                è·å–å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³• è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿå½“å‰æ—¶é—´å¯¹è±¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • è·å–æ—¶é—´çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä»¥getå¼€å¤´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´ä¿¡æ¯çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šä»¥withå¼€å¤´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • æŠŠæ—¶é—´ä¿¡æ¯åŠ å¤šå°‘ï¼šä»¥pluså¼€å¤´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • æŠŠæ—¶é—´ä¿¡æ¯å‡å¤šå°‘ï¼šä»¥minuså¼€å¤´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • è·å–æŒ‡å®šæ—¥æœŸçš„LocalDateå¯¹è±¡ï¼šLocalDate of(int year,int month,int day)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªæ—¥æœŸæ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼šequals æ—¶é—´1 æ—¶é—´2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ZoneIdã€ZoneDateTime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ZoneIdï¼šæ—¶åŒºID

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ZoneDateTimeï¼šå¸¦æœ‰æ—¶åŒºçš„æ—¶é—´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.jiekou;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.text.ParseException;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.time.ZoneId;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class tex {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws ParseException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //ZoneIdçš„ä¸€äº›æ–¹æ³•
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(ZoneId.systemDefault());//è·å–ç³»ç»Ÿçš„é»˜è®¤æ—¶åŒº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //è¾“å‡ºï¼šAsia/Shanghai
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //å±•ç¤ºjavaæ”¯æŒçš„æ‰€æœ‰æ—¶åŒºID
