                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  try {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }catch (){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  finally {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      //finallyä»£ç åŒºï¼Œæ— è®ºtryç¨‹åºæ˜¯å¦æ­£å¸¸æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œéƒ½ä¸€å®šä¼šæ‰§è¡ŒfinallyåŒºçš„ç¨‹åºï¼Œé™¤éjavaè™šæ‹Ÿæœºå…³é—­
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      //è‹¥åœ¨tryä¸­å…³é—­ioæµï¼Œioæµä»¥ä¸Šçš„ä»£ç å‡ºç°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå°±æ— æ³•å®Œæˆå…³é—­æ“ä½œ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.FileInputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.FileOutputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.IOException;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.OutputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.io.InputStream a = null;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          java.io.OutputStream f = null;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          try {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              a = new FileInputStream("files/2024-07-25 14-37-31.mkv");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              byte[] c = new byte[1024];
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              f = new FileOutputStream("files/2024.mkv", true);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int le;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              while ((le = a.read(c)) != -1) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  f.write(c, 0, le);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  //        f.write("\r\n".getBytes());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println("æ–‡ä»¶å¤åˆ¶å®Œæˆ");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          } catch (IOException e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              throw new RuntimeException(e);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          } finally {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              try {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  if (f != null)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      f.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  if (a != null)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      a.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              } catch (IOException e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  throw new RuntimeException(e);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • try-with-resource è¿™ç§é‡Šæ”¾æ–¹å¼æ¯”try-catchæ›´åŠ ç®€æ´

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  try(å®šä¹‰èµ„æº1;å®šä¹‰èµ„æº2;...){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      å¯èƒ½å‡ºç°å¼‚å¸¸çš„ä»£ç 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }catch(){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  å¼‚å¸¸å¤„ç†ä»£ç 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.FileInputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.FileOutputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.io.IOException;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          try (java.io.InputStream a = new FileInputStream("files/2024-07-25 14-37-31.mkv");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               java.io.OutputStream f = new FileOutputStream("files/2024.mkv", true)) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              byte[] c = new byte[1024];
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              int le;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              while ((le = a.read(c)) != -1) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  f.write(c, 0, le);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println("æ–‡ä»¶å¤åˆ¶å®Œæˆ");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          } catch (IOException e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              throw new RuntimeException(e);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  //æ³¨æ„ï¼šåœ¨try(åªèƒ½æ”¾ç½®èµ„æºå¯¹è±¡ )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ–‡ä»¶å­—ç¬¦è¾“å…¥æµâ€”â€”FileReader

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.FileReader;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        FileReader a = new FileReader("files/symbols.txt");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int c;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while ((c = a.read()) != -1) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.print((char) c);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.FileReader;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        FileReader a = new FileReader("files/symbols1.txt");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int c;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        char[] d = new char[5];
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while ((c = a.read(d)) != -1) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(new String(d, 0, c));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ–‡ä»¶å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡ºæµâ€”â€”FileWriter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.FileReader;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.FileWriter;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        FileReader a = new FileReader("files/symbols1.txt");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        FileWriter r = new FileWriter("files/symbols3.txt", true);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int c;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        char[] d = new char[5];
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while ((c = a.read(d)) != -1) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(d);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            r.write(d, 0, c);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        r.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        a.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ³¨æ„ï¼ å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡ºæµå†™å‡ºæ•°æ®åï¼Œå¿…é¡»åˆ·æ–°æˆ–å…³é—­æµï¼Œå†™å‡ºçš„æ•°æ®æ‰èƒ½ç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                åˆ·æ–°æµï¼ˆflashï¼‰ï¼Œå…³é—­æµï¼ˆcloseï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å­—èŠ‚æµé€‚åˆä¸€åˆ‡æ–‡ä»¶æ•°æ®çš„æ‹·è´ï¼›ä¸é€‚åˆè¯»å–ä¸­æ–‡å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡º å­—ç¬¦æµé€‚åˆåšæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶çš„è¯»å†™ç­‰æ“ä½œ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæµ--ç¼“å†²æµ ç¼“å†²æµçš„ä½œç”¨ï¼šåŒ…è£…åŸå§‹æµï¼Œæé«˜åŸå§‹æµçš„è¯»å†™æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œè‡ªå¸¦é»˜è®¤å¤§å°ä¸º8Kçš„

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • å­—èŠ‚ç¼“å†²æµ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  BufferedInputStream BufferedOutputStream

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • å­—ç¬¦ç¼“å†²æµ BufferedReaderâ€”â€”æ–°æ–¹æ³•ï¼š.readLine()è¯»å–ä¸€è¡Œ BufferedWriterâ€”â€”æ–°æ–¹æ³•ï¼š.newLine()æ¢è¡Œ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • åŸå§‹æµï¼Œç¼“å†²æµçš„æ€§èƒ½åˆ†æ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  æ¨èä½¿ç”¨ç¼“å†²æµï¼Œä»¥å­—èŠ‚æ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œå¤åˆ¶ï¼Œé€Ÿåº¦å¿«

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæµ--è½¬æ¢æµ ä¸åŒçš„ç¼–ç åœ¨è¯»å–æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šå‡ºç°ä¹±ç é—®é¢˜

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • å­—ç¬¦è½¬æ¢æµ ç”¨æ¥è§£å†³å­—ç¬¦è¯»å–æ—¶æ–‡æœ¬ä¹±ç çš„é—®é¢˜

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  InputStreamReader OutputStreamWrite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  å­—ç¬¦è¾“å‡ºè½¬æ¢æµï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ§åˆ¶å†™å‡ºçš„å­—ç¬¦çš„å­—ç¬¦é›†ç¼–ç 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæµ--æ‰“å°æµ ä½œç”¨ï¼šæ‰“å°æµå¯ä»¥å®ç°æ›´åŠ æ–¹ä¾¿é«˜æ•ˆåœ°æ‰“å°æ•°æ®ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • å­—èŠ‚æ‰“å°æµPrintStream

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • å­—ç¬¦æ‰“å°æµPrintWrite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  æ‰“å°æµçš„ä¸€ç§åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ï¼šè¾“å‡ºè¯­å¥çš„é‡å®šå‘

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  PrintStream p = new PrintStream("æ–‡ä»¶åœ°å€");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  System.setOut(p);//å°†æ‰“å°æµä¼ å…¥ï¼Œæ­¤åè¾“å‡ºçš„è¯­å¥å°±ä¼šè¢«å†™å…¥æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæµ--æ•°æ®æµ å¯ä»¥æŠŠæ•°æ®å’Œå…¶æ•°æ®ç±»å‹ä¸€å¹¶å†™å‡º

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæµ--åºåˆ—åŒ–æµ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¯ä»¥å¯¹å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡Œåºåˆ—åŒ–ï¼šæŠŠjavaå¯¹è±¡å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å¯¹å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡Œååºåˆ—åŒ–ï¼šæŠŠæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„javaå¯¹è±¡è¯»å–å‡ºæ¥

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¯¹è±¡å­—èŠ‚è¾“å‡ºæµ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //åºåˆ—åŒ–
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        try (
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ObjectOutputStream out =
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new ObjectOutputStream(new FileOutputStream("files/student.txt"));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            student s = new student("å¼ ä¸‰", "ç”·", 88.5);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            out.writeObject(s);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } catch (Exception e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¯¹è±¡å­—èŠ‚è¾“å…¥æµ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                éœ€è¦åºåˆ—åŒ–çš„å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œéœ€è¦å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªSerializableæ¥å£

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class student implements Serializable {}
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.huang.iofile;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class FileInputStream1 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        try {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            // ååºåˆ—åŒ–
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            ObjectInputStream in1 = new ObjectInputStream(new FileInputStream("files/student.txt"));
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            student s = (student) in1.readObject();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(s.toString());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } catch (Exception e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            e.printStackTrace();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¦‚æœä¸æƒ³è®©ç±»ä¸­çš„æŸä¸ªéå†å‚ä¸åºåˆ—åŒ–ï¼ˆå¦‚å¯†ç ç­‰ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨å…¶å‰é¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªtransientä¿®é¥°ç¬¦

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                private transient double grade;

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæ¡†æ¶

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ¡†æ¶ï¼šä¸ºäº†è§£å†³ä¸€ç±»é—®é¢˜ï¼Œç¼–å†™çš„ä¸€å¥—ç±»/æ¥å£ç­‰ã€‚ å¥½å¤„ï¼šåœ¨æ¡†æ¶çš„åŸºç¡€ä¸Šå¼€å‘ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ä¼˜ç§€çš„è½¯ä»¶æ¶æ„ï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                IOæ¡†æ¶ï¼šå°è£…äº†Javaæä¾›çš„å¯¹æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ•°æ®æ“ä½œçš„ä»£ç ï¼Œå¯¹å¤–æä¾›äº†æ›´ç®€å•çš„æ–¹å¼å¯¹æ–‡ä»¶è¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ç‰¹æ®Šæ–‡ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å±æ€§æ–‡ä»¶--Properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š å­˜å–æ ¼å¼ï¼škey =value keyæ˜¯ä¸èƒ½é‡å¤çš„ åç¼€ä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯ä¸ºï¼šProperties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä½œç”¨ï¼š ç”¨æ¥å­˜å‚¨é”®å€¼å¯¹æ•°æ®

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                è¯»å–å±æ€§æ–‡ä»¶æ•°æ® ä½¿ç”¨Javaæä¾›çš„Properties å®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªMapé›†åˆï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸€èˆ¬ä¸å½“ä½œé›†åˆä½¿ç”¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.leguanclock;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.Properties;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.Set;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class Propertieswenjian {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Properties p = new Properties();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        File f = new File("files/pro.properties");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Reader r = new FileReader(f);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        p.load(r);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Set<String> k = p.stringPropertyNames();
