                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œåœ¨åŒæ—¶æ“ä½œä¸€ä¸ªå…±äº«èµ„æºæ—¶ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°ä¸šåŠ¡å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ¨¡æ‹Ÿçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //è´¦æˆ·ç±»
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.threads;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class money {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    private int money = 10000;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public int getMoney() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void setMoney(int money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.money = money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void quqian(int m) throws InterruptedException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        String names = Thread.currentThread().getName();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println(names + " å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ " + m + " å½“å‰ä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Thread.sleep(50); // å¢åŠ å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        if (m <= this.money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Thread.sleep(50); // å¢åŠ å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            this.money -= m;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } else {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æ“ä½œç±»
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.threads;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class thread1 extends Thread {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    private money m;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public thread1(money m, String name) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        super(name);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.m = m;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @Override
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void run() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        try {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            m.quqian(10000);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            throw new RuntimeException(e);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æµ‹è¯•ç±»
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.threads;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class threadmain {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        money m1 = new money();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new thread1(m1, "å¼ ä¸‰").start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new thread1(m1, "é‡Œæ–¯").start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new thread1(m1, "ç‹äº”").start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new thread1(m1, "èµµå…­").start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new thread1(m1, "é£æœº").start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //å¼ ä¸‰å–é’±æˆåŠŸ0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //é‡Œæ–¯å–é’±æˆåŠŸ0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æ­¤æ—¶å‘ç°ä¸¤ä¸ªäººéƒ½å–é’±æˆåŠŸ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                /*
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ç‹äº” å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ 10000 å½“å‰ä½™é¢ 10000
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                èµµå…­ å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ 10000 å½“å‰ä½™é¢ 10000
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é‡Œæ–¯ å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ 10000 å½“å‰ä½™é¢ 10000
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¼ ä¸‰ å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ 10000 å½“å‰ä½™é¢ 10000
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é£æœº å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ 10000 å½“å‰ä½™é¢ 10000
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ç‹äº” å–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é£æœº å–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¼ ä¸‰ å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                èµµå…­ å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é‡Œæ–¯ å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ 0
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                */

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                çº¿ç¨‹åŒæ­¥

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä¸ºäº†è§£å†³çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨çš„é—®é¢˜ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹åŒæ­¥è§£å†³æ­¤é—®é¢˜ã€‚ è®©å¤šä¸ªèµ„æºå®ç°å…ˆåä¾æ¬¡è®¿é—®å…±äº«èµ„æº

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¸¸è§æ–¹æ¡ˆ åŠ é”ï¼šåªå…è®¸ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åŠ é”ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹åŠ é”åæ‰èƒ½è¿›å…¥è®¿é—®èµ„æºï¼Œè®¿é—®å®Œæ¯•åè‡ªåŠ¨è§£é”ï¼Œç„¶åå…¶ä»–è¿›ç¨‹æ‰èƒ½ç»§ç»­åŠ é”æ¥è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • æ–¹æ³•1ï¼šåŒæ­¥ä»£ç å— ä½œç”¨ï¼šæŠŠè®¿é—®çš„å…±äº«èµ„æºçš„æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç ä¸Šé”ï¼Œä¿è¯çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  synchronized(åŒæ­¥é”){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  è®¿é—®å…±äº«èµ„æºçš„æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.threads;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class money {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      private int money = 10000;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public int getMoney() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          return money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public void setMoney(int money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          this.money = money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public void quqian(int m) throws InterruptedException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String names = Thread.currentThread().getName();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          System.out.println(names + " å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ " + m + " å½“å‰ä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // å¢åŠ å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Thread.sleep(20);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          //å°†æ ¸å¿ƒä»£ç å—åŠ é”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          synchronized (this ) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              if (m <= this.money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  // å¢åŠ å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  this.money -= m;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              } else {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  å¯¹äºå½“å‰åŒæ—¶æ‰§è¡Œçš„çº¿ç¨‹æ¥è¯´ï¼ŒåŒæ­¥é”å¿…é¡»æ˜¯åŒä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºBUG å»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨å…±äº«èµ„æºä½œä¸ºé”å¯¹è±¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • æ–¹æ³•2ï¼šåŒæ­¥æ–¹æ³• æŠŠè®¿é—®å…±äº«èµ„æºçš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ–¹æ³•ä¸Šé”ï¼Œä¿è¯çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ åœ¨æ–¹æ³•çš„å‰é¢åŠ ä¸Šsynchronizedå…³é”®å­—è¿›è¡Œä¿®é¥°ã€‚é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ä¹Ÿé€‚ç”¨

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.threads;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class money {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      private int money = 10000;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public int getMoney() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          return money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public void setMoney(int money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          this.money = money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      //ä½¿ç”¨ synchronizedä¿®é¥°ç¬¦
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public synchronized void quqian(int m) throws InterruptedException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String names = Thread.currentThread().getName();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // å¢åŠ å»¶è¿Ÿæ—¶é—´
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Thread.sleep(20);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          if (m <= this.money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println(names + " å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ " + m + " å½“å‰ä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              this.money -= m;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          } else {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • æ–¹æ³•3ï¼šlocké” é€šè¿‡å®ƒå¯ä»¥è¯´åˆ›å»ºå‡ºé”å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡ŒåŠ é”å’Œè§£é”æ“ä½œï¼Œæ›´åŠ çµæ´»ï¼Œæ›´æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œæ›´å¼ºå¤§ Lockæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼Œä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥è¿›è¡Œå®ä¾‹åŒ–ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é‡‡ç”¨å®ƒçš„å®ç°ç±»ReentrantLockæ„å»ºLocké”å¯¹è±¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  package com.threads;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  public class money {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      private int money = 10000;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      //åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè´¦æˆ·é”å¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      private Lock a1 = new ReentrantLock();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public int getMoney() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          return money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public void setMoney(int money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          this.money = money;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      public void quqian(int m) throws InterruptedException {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String names = Thread.currentThread().getName();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // åŠ é”æ“ä½œ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          a1.lock();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Thread.sleep(20);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          if (m <= this.money) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println(names + " å°è¯•å–æ¬¾ " + m + " å½“å‰ä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              this.money -= m;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾æˆåŠŸï¼Œä½™é¢ " + money);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          } else {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              System.out.println(names + " å–æ¬¾å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½™é¢ä¸è¶³");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          //è§£é”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          a1.unlock();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                çº¿ç¨‹é€šä¿¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å½“å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹å…±åŒæ“ä½œå…±äº«çš„èµ„æºæ—¶ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹é€šè¿‡æŸç§æ–¹å¼å‘ŠçŸ¥è‡ªå·±çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿ç›¸äº’åè°ƒï¼Œå¹¶é¿å…æ— æ•ˆçš„èµ„æºäº‰å¤º

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                çº¿ç¨‹æ± 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¯ä»¥å¤ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹çš„æŠ€æœ¯ å½“ç”¨æˆ·è¯·æ±‚æ¬¡æ•°è¿‡å¤šæ—¶ï¼Œä¼šåˆ›å»ºå‡ºå¤§é‡çš„æ–°çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå ç”¨CPUå†…å­˜èµ„æºï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä¼šä¸¥é‡å½±å“ç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ€§èƒ½

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹æ± 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ–¹æ³•1ï¼šçº¿ç¨‹æ± æ¥å£ï¼šExecutorServiceçš„å®ç°ç±»ThreadPoolExecutorè‡ªåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹æ± å¯¹è±¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ThreadPoolExecutor(int corePoolSize, int maximumPoolSize, long keepAliveTime, TimeUnit unit, BlockingQueue<Runnable> workQueue, ThreadFactory threadFactory, RejectedExecutionHandler handler)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å‚æ•°è§£é‡Š

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ–¹æ³•2ï¼šExecutorså·¥å…·ç±»å®ç°çº¿ç¨‹æ± 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                è¿™äº›æ–¹æ³•éƒ½æ˜¯é€šè¿‡çº¿ç¨‹æ± çš„å®ç°ç±»ThreadPoolExecutoråˆ›å»ºçš„çº¿ç¨‹æ± å¯¹è±¡ Executorsåœ¨å¤§å‹å¹¶å‘ç³»ç»Ÿç¯å¢ƒä¸­å¦‚æœä¸æ³¨æ„ï¼Œå¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°ç³»ç»Ÿé£é™©é—®é¢˜

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¤„ç†Runnable,Callableä»»åŠ¡

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ExecutorServiceçš„å¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¹¶å‘ï¼Œå¹¶è¡Œ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ­£åœ¨è¿è¡Œçš„ç¨‹åº/è½¯ä»¶å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç‹¬ç«‹çš„è¿›ç¨‹ã€‚ â€‹ çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯å±äºè¿›ç¨‹çš„ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªè¿›ç¨‹å¯ä»¥åŒæ—¶è¿è¡Œå¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹ â€‹ è¿›ç¨‹ä¸­çš„å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯å¹¶å‘å’Œå¹¶è¡Œæ‰§è¡Œçš„ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å¹¶å‘ï¼Ÿ è¿›ç¨‹ä¸­çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ˜¯ç”±CPUè´Ÿè´£è°ƒåº¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„ï¼Œä½†CPUèƒ½åŒæ—¶å¤„ç†çº¿ç¨‹çš„æ•°é‡æœ‰é™ï¼Œä¸ºäº†ä¿è¯å…¨éƒ¨çº¿ç¨‹éƒ½èƒ½å¾€å‰æ‰§è¡Œï¼ŒCPUä¼šè½®è¯¢ä¸ºç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ¯ä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹æœåŠ¡ï¼Œç”±äºCPUåˆ‡æ¢çš„é€Ÿåº¦å¾ˆå¿«ï¼Œç»™æˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ„Ÿè§‰è¿™äº›çº¿ç¨‹åœ¨åŒæ—¶æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œè¿™å°±æ˜¯å¹¶å‘ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯å¹¶è¡Œï¼Ÿ åœ¨åŒä¸€æ—¶åˆ»ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æœ‰å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åœ¨è¢«CPUè°ƒåº¦æ‰§è¡Œ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å¹¶å‘å’Œå¹¶è¡Œæ˜¯åŒæ—¶è¿›è¡Œçš„

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                çº¿ç¨‹çš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸ

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Javaçº¿ç¨‹æœ‰6ç§ çŠ¶æ€

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                NEW,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                RUNNABLE,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                BLOCKED,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                WAITING,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                TIMED_WAITING,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                TERMINATED;

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä¹è§‚é”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä¸€å¼€å§‹ä¸ä¸Šé”ï¼Œç­‰è¦å‡ºç°çº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰å¼€å§‹æ§åˆ¶ã€‚æ€§èƒ½è¾ƒå¥½ï¼Œçº¿ç¨‹å®‰å…¨ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Javaå†…ç½®çš„ï¼ŒAtomicInteger(Atomicxxx)å®ç°ä¹è§‚é”
