                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.Socket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class server {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ServerSocket s = new ServerSocket(6666);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡ç«¯å¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while (true) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Socket s12 = s.accept();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            new serverxc(s12).start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ¡ˆä¾‹ï¼šç¾¤èŠ éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªäººå‘æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œç¾¤èŠä¸­çš„å…¶ä»–äººå¯ä»¥æ¥æ”¶åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªæ¶ˆæ¯

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¸»ç¨‹åº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.web;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.ServerSocket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.Socket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.ArrayList;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.List;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class server {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªé›†åˆï¼Œå­˜å‚¨åœ¨çº¿çš„å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static List<Socket> online = new ArrayList<>();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ServerSocket s = new ServerSocket(6666);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡ç«¯å¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while (true) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Socket s12 = s.accept();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            online.add(s12);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            new serverxc(s12).start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æœåŠ¡ç«¯è½¬å‘çº¿ç¨‹ç¨‹åº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.web;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.ServerSocket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.Socket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.ArrayList;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.List;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class serverxc extends Thread {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Socket s1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public serverxc(Socket s) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.s1 = s;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @Override
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void run() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        try (InputStream in1 = s1.getInputStream();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             DataInputStream din = new DataInputStream(in1)) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            while (true) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                String s = din.readUTF();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                System.out.println(s);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                System.out.println(s1.getRemoteSocketAddress());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                fasongAll(s);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } catch (Exception e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            server.online.remove(s1);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    private void fasongAll(String s) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        for (Socket socket : server.online) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            OutputStream os = socket.getOutputStream();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            DataOutputStream dos = new DataOutputStream(os);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            dos.writeUTF(s);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ä¸»ç¨‹åº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.web;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.DataInputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.DataOutputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.InputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.OutputStream;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.Scanner;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class inet {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //åˆ›å»ºsocketå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°é€šä¿¡ç®¡é“å¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Socket s = new Socket(InetAddress.getLocalHost(), 6666);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        new goother(s).start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //è·å–å­—èŠ‚è¾“å…¥è¾“å‡ºæµå¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        OutputStream os = s.getOutputStream();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        InputStream is = s.getInputStream();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //å°†ä½çº§æµåŒ…è£…æˆé«˜çº§æµ
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        DataOutputStream dos = new DataOutputStream(os);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        DataInputStream dis = new DataInputStream(is);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //ä½¿ç”¨
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while (true) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            dos.writeUTF(sc.next());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //        dos.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ¥æ”¶çº¿ç¨‹ç¨‹åº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.web;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.InetAddress;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.Socket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.ArrayList;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.Arrays;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.util.Scanner;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class goother extends Thread {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Socket s1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public goother(Socket s) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.s1 = s;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @Override
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void run() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        try (InputStream in1 = s1.getInputStream();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             DataInputStream din = new DataInputStream(in1)) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            while (true) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                System.out.println(din.readUTF());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                System.out.println(s1.getRemoteSocketAddress());
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } catch (Exception e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            server.online.remove(s1);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                BSæ¶æ„å¼€å‘

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                BSæ¶æ„åªéœ€è¦å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡ç«¯

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                HTTPåè®®è§„å®šçš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æœåŠ¡ç«¯ä¸»ç¨‹åº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.web;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.ServerSocket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.Socket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class server {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        ServerSocket s = new ServerSocket(8080);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //åˆ›å»ºæœåŠ¡ç«¯å¯¹è±¡
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        System.out.println("------æœåŠ¡å™¨å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ------");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        while (true) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Socket s12 = s.accept();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            System.out.println(STR."\{s12.getRemoteSocketAddress()}ä¸Šçº¿äº†");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            new serverxc(s12).start();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                //æœåŠ¡ç«¯çº¿ç¨‹ç¨‹åº
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                package com.web;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.io.*;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                import java.net.Socket;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public class serverxc extends Thread {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Socket s1;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public serverxc(Socket s) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        this.s1 = s;
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    @Override
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void run() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        try {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            OutputStream out = s1.getOutputStream();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            PrintStream pr = new PrintStream(out);
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            pr.println("HTTP/1.1 200 OK");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            pr.println("Content-Type:text/html;charset=UTF-8");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            pr.println();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            pr.println("<h1>HELLO WORLD</h1>");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            pr.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            out.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            s1.close();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        } catch (IOException e) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            e.printStackTrace();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é¢å¯¹è®¿é—®é‡è¾ƒå¤§çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚éƒ½å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå®¹æ˜“è®©ç³»ç»Ÿå´©æºƒï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± è§£å†³è¿™ä¸€é—®é¢˜ï¼Œåœ¨é«˜å¹¶å‘ä¸‹ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸ä¼šè®©ç³»ç»Ÿç˜«ç—ª

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Javaé«˜çº§æŠ€æœ¯

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                é’ˆå¯¹æœ€å°çš„åŠŸèƒ½å•å…ƒè¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œç¼–è¾‘æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç å¯¹å…¶è¿›è¡Œæ­£ç¡®æ€§æµ‹è¯• ä¹‹å‰è¦æµ‹è¯•æŸä¸€æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œéœ€è¦åœ¨mainæ–¹æ³•ä¸­ç¼–å†™æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç ï¼Œä¸çµæ´»ï¼Œä¸æ–¹ä¾¿

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Junitæµ‹è¯•æ¡†æ¶

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                åœ¨IDEAä¸­é›†æˆäº†è¯¥æ¡†æ¶ ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼š å¯ä»¥çµæ´»çš„ç¼–å†™ä»£ç ï¼Œå¯¹æŸä¸ªæ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±å¯ä»¥ä¸€é”®å®Œæˆå¯¹å…¨éƒ¨æ–¹æ³•çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æµ‹è¯• ä¸éœ€è¦è‡ªå·±å»åˆ†ææµ‹è¯•ç»“æœï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆæµ‹è¯•æŠ¥å‘Š

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                ä½¿ç”¨æ­¥éª¤ï¼š

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1. å°†Junitæ¡†æ¶å¯¼å…¥åˆ°é¡¹ç›®

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2. ä¸ºéœ€è¦æµ‹è¯•çš„ä¸šåŠ¡ç±»å®šä¹‰å¯¹åº”çš„æµ‹è¯•ç±»ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•ç¼–å†™å¯¹åº”çš„æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆå¿…é¡»å…¬å…±ï¼Œæ— å‚ï¼Œæ— è¿”å›å€¼ï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3. æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šå¿…é¡»å£°æ˜@Testæ³¨è§£ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œç¼–å†™ä»£ç è°ƒç”¨è¢«æµ‹è¯•çš„ä¸šåŠ¡æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œæµ‹è¯•ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                4. å¼€å§‹æµ‹è¯•ï¼šé€‰ä¸­æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå³é”®é€‰æ‹©Junitå°è±¡ï¼Œç»“æœä¸ºç»¿è‰²ä»£è¡¨æˆåŠŸï¼Œçº¢è‰²ä»£è¡¨å¤±è´¥ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public static void show() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    System.out.println("hello");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                @Test
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                public void testshow() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    junit1.show();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                }

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                æ–­è¨€æœºåˆ¶ï¼šé€šè¿‡é¢„æµ‹ç»“æœå’Œå®é™…è¿è¡Œç»“æœå¯¹æ¯”ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­ç¨‹åºä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨bug

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 public static int shownum(String i) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        return i.length();
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 @Test
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    public void testshownum() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        int i = junit1.shownum("abcdefg");
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        //å¼•å…¥æ–­è¨€æœºåˆ¶
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Assert.assertEquals("æœ€å¤§ç´¢å¼•ç»“æœæœ‰è¯¯", 6, i);
